title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Dripping Springs, Texas
content:
Photo submitted by John Krause, “This picture was taken Sunday morning, Aug 1st, at Reime’s Ranch, northwest of Austin TX…about 3-miles in on the Black Diamond trail.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of The Day. […]

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Dripping Springs, Texas appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
